comment: I honestly couldn't have asked for a better freshman seminar teacher. Michael 100% cares about how you're doing in all of your classes, how you're doing in general, and will take time to talk to you if you ever need anything. He allows 2 absences before you drop a letter grade with each additional absence; 6 or more absences and you fail. LOVE HIM!
His class was taken wayyyyyy too seriously. We spent the majority of the semester engaging in irrelevant conversations and he gave us too much work.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: He is an amazing human being. He is always more than happy to help you in class and is the best adviser. He will also listen to your problems. But anyway his class is really easy to understand and is tons of fun, I recommend taking him for your KSU 1101 class. You will not regret it :)
Great professor. highly recommend. very chill class. if you are struggling he will help all you have to do is ask. expectations are clear and easy. he allows 6 absences or you fail
rating_tags: Participation matters--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Would take again

comment: Coolest professor you could possibly take. Will work with you if you are struggling and willing to give extra credit for simple things.

My favorite teacher. He gives you three excused absences. If the class is struggling he will give everyone extra credit. He works with you and is so much fun. Makes you laugh and tries his best to make sure you get a good grade. 10/10 would take again. You CANNOT fail. unless you do absolutely nothing.

Michael is not only my favorite professor so far at KSU. He is also a great advisor. He articulates his expectations clearly and will work with you as long as you communicate your circumstances to him. He expects participation and values all students perspectives and contributions.
